titles.title: Providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 8/5/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, August 5, 2010, through Saturday, August 14, 2010, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, September 13, 2010.
